Thank you for your interest in The Decadent Review. We have received your submission and look forward to reviewing it.

Thanks!
-The Decadent Review

Dear James,

Great to hear from you again. Thank you for the submission. I'll update with a draft over email.

Yours,

Dear James B. Nicola,

Congratulations! This message confirms the acceptance of your submission to The Decadent Review.

Thanks again.
Sincerely,
Dimitri Kaufman
The Decadent Review

Dear James, I've sent you an email (to nicolajamesb@juno.com) with this message, did you receive it?

>

Dear James,

Here’s a private link to a draft: https://thedecadentreview.com/corpus/how-true-love-lies/

Please also send a bio text for an author page.

By the way, some time ago I’ve changed the top art for your previous piece with us, Three Loves, or Four, which now has a segment from Klimt’s Beethoven Frieze.

Let me know what you think, yours,

D.

Wonderful, Dimitri. I had a hunch this one would interest you!


Thanks once again.


Best regards,


James B. Nicola
